item.title: AttnBoost: Retail Supply Chain Sales Insights via Gradient Boosting Perspective
item.description: arXiv:2509.10506v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Forecasting product demand in retail supply chains presents a complex challenge due to noisy, heterogeneous features and rapidly shifting consumer behavior. While traditional gradient boosting decision trees (GBDT) offer strong predictive performance ...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> API, attention, model, product, framework | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
